mapper.insert: insert into mkt_operator_log (OPERATION_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_STATE_BEFORE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_STATE_AFTER, OPERATOR_ACCOUNT, OPERATION_TYPE, OPERATION_DATE ) values (#{operationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{mktActivityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignStateBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignStateAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
